attributes.action: give equal rights to abled bodied people as well as disabled people
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Every day I find that someone who is disabled has preference over me!  For example myself and my wife purchased a car yesterday, I went to the post office to purchase the tax disc but could not because the car taxation class was disabled, because I am able bodied I have to go to DVLA to tax it. This increases my carbon footprint and costs more than if I was disabled I feel that this is discrimination!!

rejection.details:
As this is a personal case, please contact the Department for Transport direct:

http://www.dft.gov.uk/contact
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
